short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small tool for web developers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: remCalc (the app and the website) is a tool designed to assist web developers & web designers in completing mundane tasks by creating quick shortcuts for converting rem to px, px to rem, creating advanced responsive sliders for use in websites, providing quick links to helpful sites, and more.
